ManagePayouts.title: Manage Payouts
ManagePayouts.description: Keep your payout information updated (e.g. schedule, bank details) to facilitate smooth payouts
ManagePayouts.payoutInformation1: Payouts are processed automatically every year, or when an organization collects 30,000 EUR or its equivalent in other currency.
ManagePayouts.payoutInformation2: Payouts are issued by Plant-for-the-Planet Foundation and its sister organizations eg: Plant-for-the-Planet US, Plant-for-the-Planet Switzerland etc.
ManagePayouts.payoutInformation3: You can adjust the payout schedule and receive frequent payouts as long as you meet the 1,500 EUR minimum amount criteria.
ManagePayouts.supportInformation: If you have an exceptional case, please contact <supportLink>support@plant-for-the-planet.org</supportLink>.

errors.payoutMinAmountTooLow: Minimum payout amount should be at least {currency} {minAmount}

placeholders.bankAddress: e.g. 1 West St, Hamington Way, MA, 10311, USA
placeholders.remarks: e.g. Please include ref acct=1237 on the transfer.

helperText.currency: Select “Default” if this is your standard bank account, if you need to provide special details for a currency please select it here and provide the details. We will also use the standard minimum amounts for a payout.
helperText.remarks: Provide additional details, for example Intermediary Bank Details, PCs (Purpose Codes) or other References here.

accountError.min_amount_range: The minimum payout amount must be at least {currency} {min}.
accountError.min_amount_forbidden: You may not specify a payout minimum amount for the default account.
accountError.default: Something went wrong while creating an account. Please try after a while.

ManagePayouts.accountCreationSuccess: Your account details were successfully saved.
ManagePayouts.accountUpdationSuccess: Your account details were successfully updated.
ManagePayouts.scheduleSaveSuccess: Your payout schedule was successfully saved.
ManagePayouts.noBankAccountText: You haven't added any bank details yet.
